sql-descriptor.sql: WITH T1 ( PKCL_CORP_CODE ,PKCL_COME_CODE ,PKCL_TABL_ID ,PKCL_COLM_ID ,PKCL_SORT_NUMB ,PKCL_COLM_NAME ,PKCL_DATA_TYPE ,PKCL_DATA_LENG ,PKCL_COLM_ALGN ,PKCL_WITH_SCRN ,PKCL_DISP_ALLW ,PKCL_UPDT_DATE ,PKCL_UPDT_CMAN ,PKCL_INIT_DATE ,PKCL_INIT_CMAN ) AS ( SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CORP_CODE', 1, '법인코드', 'CHAR', '4', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_STND_GUBN', 2, '표준구분', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20200421', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_STND_DEGR', 3, '표준차수', 'VARCHAR', '10', 'C', '60', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_GUBN_CODE', 4, '구분코드', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE', 5, '코드', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_SORT_NUMB', 6, 'SORT순번', 'NUMBER', '5', 'R', '70', 'Y', '20240103', 'SYSTEMPK', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_GUBN_NAME', 7, '구분코드명', 'VARCHAR', '80', 'L', '100', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_NAME', 8, '코드명', 'VARCHAR', '80', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_VALU', 9, '적용값', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_PRIC', 10, '적용단가', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_RATE1', 11, '적용율1', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_RATE2', 12, '적용율2', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_RATE3', 13, '적용율3', 'NUMBER', '22', 'R', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_GRP1', 14, '분류그룹1', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_GRP2', 15, '분류그룹2', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_GRP3', 16, '분류그룹3', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_GRP4', 17, '분류그룹4', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_CODE_GRP5', 18, '분류그룹5', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'L', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_APPL_GUBN', 19, '적용여부', 'CHAR', '1', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_END0_DATE', 20, '적용종료일', 'CHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20140609', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_REMK', 21, 'REMARK', 'VARCHAR', '200', 'L', '200', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEM', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_UPDT_CMAN', 22, '수정자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPG', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_UPDT_DATE', 23, '수정일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPG', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_INIT_CMAN', 24, '등록자', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPG', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT 'K1', 'ALL0', 'CATBCMPK', 'CMPK_INIT_DATE', 25, '등록일', 'VARCHAR', '8', 'C', '80', 'Y', '20221110 10:47:27', 'SYSTEMPG', '20140609', 'SYSTEM' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.TABLE_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CREATED_YN ,CASE WHEN C.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END COMMENTS_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE >= A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END UPDATED_YN ,CASE WHEN D.PKCL_CORP_CODE IS NULL THEN 'I' WHEN A.PKCL_UPDT_DATE > D.PKCL_UPDT_DATE THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_COLM_ALGN != D.PKCL_COLM_ALGN THEN 'U' WHEN A.PKCL_WITH_SCRN != D.PKCL_WITH_SCRN THEN 'U' ELSE 'X' END MG_MODE ,A.* FROM T1 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS C ON C.TABLE_NAME = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND C.COLUMN_NAME = A.PKCL_COLM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CITBPKCL D ON D.PKCL_CORP_CODE = A.PKCL_CORP_CODE AND D.PKCL_COME_CODE = A.PKCL_COME_CODE AND D.PKCL_TABL_ID = A.PKCL_TABL_ID AND D.PKCL_COLM_ID = A.PKCL_COLM_ID ORDER BY A.PKCL_SORT_NUMB

CREATE TABLE CATBCMPK ( CMPK_CORP_CODE CHAR(4) ,CMPK_STND_GUBN CHAR(1) ,CMPK_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10) ,CMPK_GUBN_CODE VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_CODE VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_SORT_NUMB NUMBER(5, 0) ,CMPK_GUBN_NAME VARCHAR(80) ,CMPK_CODE_NAME VARCHAR(80) ,CMPK_APPL_VALU NUMBER(20, 6) ,CMPK_APPL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6) ,CMPK_APPL_RATE1 NUMBER(5, 2) ,CMPK_APPL_RATE2 NUMBER(5, 2) ,CMPK_APPL_RATE3 NUMBER(5, 2) ,CMPK_CODE_GRP1 VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_CODE_GRP2 VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_CODE_GRP3 VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_CODE_GRP4 VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_CODE_GRP5 VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1) ,CMPK_END0_DATE CHAR(8) ,CMPK_REMK VARCHAR(200) ,CMPK_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8) ,CMPK_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8) ,CONSTRAINT CATBCMPK_PK PRIMARY KEY( CMPK_CORP_CODE ,CMPK_STND_GUBN ,CMPK_STND_DEGR ,CMPK_GUBN_CODE ,CMPK_CODE ,CMPK_SORT_NUMB ) )
WITH T1 (C1, C2) AS ( SELECT 'CORP_CODE','법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'COME_CODE','공법' FROM DUAL ) SELECT * FROM T1
